TEXT.TITLE: HARMON INDUSTRIES <HRMN.O> IN PACT WITH AMTRAK
TEXT.BODY: Harmon Industries said it signed a contract worth more than three mln dlrs with the National Railroad Passenger Corp (Amtrak). Harmon Industries said the contract includes the design, engineering, manufacturing, delivery and system integration for signalling equipment along Amtrak's 55-mile Philadelphia to Atlantic City, N.J., line.
